channel.title: How do i change the background?
channel.description: i dnt understand how you change the interface on the loading screen, can some body please help me

item.title: How do i change the background?
item.dc:creator: @ShotNoodle ShotNoodle
item.description:
@ShotNoodle wrote:

I know how to change the background of a 317 client, which one are you using?
If it’s a 317 go into the client folder, then go into the client folder and keep looking through the files until you see the background of the client. Then just copy whatever it’s called, delete the image and put your image there. For the name just paste what you copied and it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the background?
